## JsPlumbInstance.updateOffset() method

Update the cached offset information for some element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updateOffset(params?: UpdateOffsetOptions): ViewportElement<T["E"]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [UpdateOffsetOptions](./core.updateoffsetoptions.md) |  an UpdateOffsetResult containing the offset information for the given element. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ViewportElement](./core.viewportelement.md)<!-- -->&lt;T\["E"\]&gt;
